title: Senate confirms Charles Kushner to become ambassador to France

author: Zach Schonfeld
description: Alina Habba, the interim U.S. attorney for the District of New Jersey, announced Monday she is charging Rep. LaMonica McIver (D-N.J.) with assaulting law enforcement while at an U.S. Immigrations and Customs Enforcement (ICE) detention center in Newark earlier this month.   It marks the first time that President Trump's Justice Department has criminally charged a...
title: Habba announces criminal charge against Rep. McIver over ICE facility scuffle

author: Brett Samuels
description: President Trump on Monday delivered remarks to members of the Kennedy Center board of trustees, which Trump drastically overhauled earlier this year as he sought to put his stamp on the performing arts institution. Trump held the meeting in the State Dining Room at the White House on the same day the Kennedy Center announced...
title: Trump to Kennedy Center board members: 'We’re going to do some good things, but the basics are there'

author: Brett Samuels
description: The Department of Justice (DOJ) on Monday released former President Biden’s interview with former special counsel Robert Hur, bringing to a close a lengthy battle to quash the audio amid broader concerns over the former president’s health. The Justice Department has already released a transcript of Biden’s conversation with the special counsel, which shows him...
title: DOJ releases full Biden-Hur interview audio
